articles.title: 2025 NBA Finals preview: Thunder vs. Pacers storylines, including star PG matchup and Paul George history - CBS Sports
articles.description: Game 1 between OKC and Indiana tips off on Thursday
articles.content: The 2025 NBA Finals matchup is set, as the Indiana Pacers will take on the Oklahoma City Thunder with Game 1 tipping off on June 5. Both teams are battle-tested and will now face off against each oth… [+8404 chars]
